oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Booklet "The Christian Minister's Advice to A Married Couple"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This booklet was presented to Benjamin Allen and Martha Jane Walker on the occasion of their wedding at the bride's father's home. It is signed by H. West, Travel Elder of the Methodist Epsicopal Church South. "Commandments ten god gave to" is repeated for 5 lines on back cover horizontally, followed by "this you see remember me" 3 times at the bottom, once on the spine, and 8 lines on the front cover of the book. Looks to be signed "William" at the bottom front cover. Writing is different from others.
